ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package bulk mild pork sausage
1 (16 ounce) package bulk hot pork sausage
1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
2 cups biscuit baking mix (such as Bisquick®)

cookingTips: Mix ingredients gently with hands for even distribution without overworking
Roll into uniform 1-inch balls for consistent cooking
Bake at 350°F for 20-25 minutes until golden and cooked through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me combine sausage and cheese into perfectly-sized balls and bake them evenly.
